document.full_text: bahrain scored a public relations coup on friday by winning back its formula one grand prix, canceled earlier this year after pro-democracy protests erupted in the gulf arab island kingdom.
document.title: protests simmer as bahrain wins back formula one
lines_and_colors: bahrain scored a public relations coup on friday by winning back its formula one grand prix, canceled earlier this year after pro-democracy protests erupted in the gulf arab island kingdom.
